meanings.definition: A game played with a ball and bat, in which players run around bases to score points.
meanings.sent1: During recess, the children enjoyed a friendly game of rounders in the park.
meanings.sent2: The championship rounders match was intense and exciting to watch.
meanings.sent3: The rounders game got so competitive that even the spectators were cheering loudly.
meanings.sent4: Playing rounders felt like being part of a thrilling adventure, running from base to base.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the bat hitting the ball echoed across the field during the rounders game.
